Misleading Misleading information that leads you to believe that you paid for both Federal and State Returns. NOT TRUE! They charge you to file State. Cover states"Federal Returns E=File plus State Returns". Then they charge you $26.00
did not pull up last yr. tax

column1: said I had e-filed ck 5 days later said I have not yet filed did not like the intuit disk

column2: Worst thing ever. I will NEVER be using this again. They gave me the wrong federal tax amount that I was supposed to get back. They told me I was getting $1000 more back than what the government gave me. Also, to this day, they can't get my state taxes correct. Worst program known to man. I will never be using turbotax again and neither will anyone I know. Thanks a lot turbo tax. Everything.

Confusing treatment of option exercises The gain on my option exercise was reported in my W-2. Turbo Tax separately calculated the gain effectively double counting the gain. I researched this problem through Turbo Tax help, which was no help at all.

column1: I tried several times to correct the double count manually but each time I tried to correct the double count, Turbo tax over-rode the correction ad re-calculated the gain a 2nd time.
I'm still not sure I've submitted the correct information.
The inability to correctly handle option exercises is a serious flaw in the software.
Separately, I was as unhappy as everyone else over the initial deletion of Schedule D from the DELUXE package. Totally confusing treatment of option exercises

column2: almost perfect I've used TT before. It's pretty easy to use. In 2013, had a tax preparer ask more questions and take the time to explain why. The "?" buttons help, but aren't the best at explaining.

column1: Big reason I don't recommend this is that you cannot change the billing options. I just wanted to file Federal using TT, but was forced to file State taxes with the software. Would be great if I could opt out of a "suggested" software option. Next year I will plan earlier so I can see if other software can produce the same or better results. Maybe I'll buy the CD instead of online program so I know exactly what I'm getting and paying for. cannot change pricing options.

column2: fixed return no eic This didn't allow me to go back to change the eic. hopefully it went through

Nightmare! Really!! Right after e-filing, the Turbo Tax program crashed and wouldn't give me access to my account so I had no way of knowing whether my taxes actually were filed. I also was unable to access my Intuit account to even get into the program to ask questions. I requested a reset of my password, but that was also frozen and would give me an error message. So, my hands were tied with no way of getting back to my account or taxes. Today, April 18, I was able to access my Intuit account and able to check if the taxes were transmitted, and no, they were not. I transmitted them today but now I will owe a penalty. This was such a nightmare to experience. So frustrating!! The whole program crashed, I wasn't able to file on time and now I'll owe a penalty fee!

Tough to correct Turbo tax was very friendly all the way to the point where I e filed it. It said everything had been reviewed and was good to go. Unfortunately, my return was almost immediately rejected because I did not have form 8962, the Premium Tax Credit form. It appears that turbo tax, did in fact, do the calculations for the form, but it was not e-filed with the rest of the forms. I could see the individual form that showed numbers that i had previously input as answers to turbo tax questions, but this seemed to not exist when viewing the tax return as a whole- either in the e-format or in the hard copy I printed for my records. Quite frustrating trying to figure out exactly what I needed to do in order to correctly amend my return. tough time amending the rejected return

Dissatisfied with privacy code I keep getting my filed taxes kicked back due to a PIN number issue. The IRS provided me with a 6 digit number but turbo tax only allows me to input 5 numbers. Then, I went online and got another PIN number and input that. I got kicked out for that also. I tried to put in my 6 digit pin again and it would only take 5 numbers, What the heck is going on?????????? Unable to inout pertinent ddata

Turbo tax Doing my taxes by myself was really fast and easy. The only thing i didnt like was i didnt want to pay an extra 29.99$ for my taxes. I hit the FREE turbo tax and they charged me 60.00$. Why say its free if its really not? Overall i will never go back to having my taxes prepared for me. It said free and they charged me $60.00
absolutely terrible Today is the 18th and the program is stipp going in a circle and will NOT let me filemy return. Will not use again and will advise others not to use it .

column1: Refer to service files 411271660 and 411381694. The people were excellent.

I work during your hours of operation and cannot try to get this done during that time. I finally mailed both federal and state forms,; after paying TurboTax. the program is so good that my name is rejected "can only be letters or numbers"

column2: Problem with Amended Returen for2014 Overall would rate program 5 stars, with the step by step help to make sure don't miss any deductions and assure all forms are filled out correctly.

column1: The only problem was when got ready to finish return for filing, I some how answered questions about amending a return. The questions were confusing.

Once started an amended return, I couldn't find a way back to original return to file it. I did send a question to support team about problem. I was not able to find the solution for this problem when initially search site. It was later posted to fix problem and I was able to get a person on the phone . She was very customer focused but didn't know how fix this problem but encourage my efforts, which did work at 11:28 pm so got taxes filed====so what frustration and sweating.
Used TurboTax for over 20 yrs for personal & business taxes with no problem till this year. Please fix this in next version.
I will continue to be a loyal customer and advertise it to all my friends and family. Dr. Thomas Brown Change the questions on amending a return so don't accidentailly start process

column2: Missing Forms Once Intuit sent me the Home and Business Version, after buying the Deluxe version without the forms necessary to file, the program worked as it had for the 16 years of use. Deluxe verision did not have Forms from past years. Required multiple calls to Intuit to get correct version to file.

Functionality Your product doesn't seem to be getting easier, it is getting less helpful. My tax situations haven't changed either or are no different than what I have had to deal with in the past. Nothing new to deal with. Transfer from last year should mean transfer all data and ID where if came from and provide cross reference by mousing over and show link/address/etc. More explanations. Help is useless and should again relate to the section you are on. Using the community is a cop out and has always been a pet peeve of mine. You end of with instances of multiple answers and no clear indication of which one is correct. You also try and fool people into thinking some of these people answering are related to or associated with or employed by intuit. getting less helpful over the years

Easy to use But too expensive TurboTax is easy to extremely easy to use and quick. If you can file your federal return free - it's the best deal out there. HOWEVER, you have to pay - it's just too expensive! You must pay for state returns regardless - again, just too expensive for the average person. It brings the overall value of TurboTax way down unless you have a very, very complicated tax return. State returns just too expensive for the average person

Disappointed! At the end of the year I had not receive any letters from IRS but in February of 2015 I received a letter that I owe over 4/5 of the 2013 refund that I received from the 2014 return I filed with Turbo Tax software that was completely inaccurate and I am very disappointed that the software did not meet my expectations using the 1040A tax form. Calculations were way off...
Tax I will never use turbo tax again. I got errors in the software throughout the whole process - installation, updating, and filing. software had glitches

not happy Had 2 problems. I did my boys return but his wife is new to this country & filed her own. I started my boys filing separate. Later found out she filled wrong. I went back in & changed my boys to file joint. Could not get the insurance part to realize it had changed from separate to joint. It keep wants %'s. I had to start a new return to get it done.

column1: I thought my return was filed. I never heard if the IRS accepted my return or no. it was not. I went back in to file a return. Turns out I used the IRS pin # but Turbo tax put in the amount from last year. I did not know I had to delete one or the other. It is a good thing I had a refund.
I also did not know how many returns I could e-file until mine was filed & it was in the small print wanted me to buy a different version if I was filing for more than five people.
I was also working on the last day and did not know how to get quick answers to ?'s. Did not tell me was return was not filed

column2: Support nonexistent Over the years I have always had to go elsewhere

column1: resolve any problems.
I have spent many hours waiting on the help line and have
never gotten thru to a support person.

I have talked to tax preparers who use other software and they are able to get thru to their software providers very quickly to resolve software problems. Over the years have never been able to get help from support

column2: 2014 t/refund too pricey for folks preparing simple1099misc requiring

column1: schedule C deletions from previous editions

column2: Deceptive additional state efile cost TurboTax is an elegant, convenient tax preparation program. It downloaded my business records from QuickBooks. The process was very convenient. I like the questionnaire approach that is used to gather my information.

column1: However, I dislike that annual pricing has substantially increased over the past few years for TurboTax. My daughter has a very low income, but some business income. Turbotax would not honor their advertisement for free file for her because of about $1000 of business income.

I paid for this Home& Business software version that includes Federal Returns & Federal E-file and State Returns. However, when I went to efile my state return I was informed that I would have to pay an additional $24.99 to do so. efile of my state return should be included at the price I paid for the software. I consider this deceptive to advertise state returns, but then to require additional payment at the time I attempt to efile.
I will be shopping for a competitor's product next year. I hope H&R Block provides an appealing alternative. Required additional payment to efile state taxes

column2: I will use turbotax again because it is fast and easy and you have my information already stored. But in the beginning when i wanted to choose how my taxes were being filed it only gave me the 54.99 option and it upset me quite a bit. Then come to find out that theres a penalty for taking the payment out of my refund was icing on the cake. thanks turbo tax for making it easy but jewing me out of 90 dollars.
Disappointed 2 years in a row fair did not port in IL state pin numbers

User's aren't stupid User's aren't stupid. Returning to amend input data is a chore. The program should ask the user to rate their level of familiarity or skill with Turbo tax. Jumping to forms to correct a figure doesn't always work as a shortcut. Amending input data is a chore.
Hard to Contact You Some things simply don't work in Turbo Tax and it is near impossible to find a phone contact number. Impossible to get phone help, can't find the number on your site

I felt nickled and dimed Be upfront and honest about how much it's going to cost to use the software! I thought I'd paid for the use once I bought the license! Additional fees with no warning is annoying! I HATE sneaky costs for additional states, e-filing for states and audit protection! Tell me all costs up front!

Frustrated with the 2014 Premier edition I was very frustrated this year with this version of TurboTax. In the 30+ years that I have been using TurboTax, I have never had so much trouble in entering my data and having it transfer properly. Especially had difficulty with Its Deductible and importing the data.

column1: The extra info that Form 8283 required was just about impossible to correct. Also, all overrides came up as errors but only because you apparently can't use overrides if you are filing electronically. There should be a question about filing electronically - I think there was one near the end of completing info. If you answer NO then overrides should not continue to come up as errors. They could be shown once to give the preparer the opportunity to correct them.

My federal return claimed numerous errors - they were all related to overrides concerning my non-cash charitable contributions. The overrides were the only way that I could get the info required onto the 8283 form.

Your program showed those errors on the review of the Federal tax return and again on the final review after completing my State tax return. Also, when the mention of errors comes up the only option is to review the errors - you can't say to skip them.

I took the time nearly at every place I was having problems to give feedback naming the location and explaining my problem. On your feedback requested I could not tell if the page or screen view that I was on would be known to you.

Having said all this, I have used your program for I think over 30+ years, with very few problems. I remember that the first year that I used It was a wonderful experience. My returns have grown more complicated. This is the first time that I have had major problems with your program. I hope that my comments will help you improve your program for 2015. Info ($ amounts mostly) did not transfer with correct amount and difficult to correct returns.

column2: Mr Fernandez I liked the online service but seriously I would stick to the software. I can do more taxes from family members and the online service is only for one person. The software is 80 dlls and the online service was 185 .. big difference Start with free then the add on gets a little bit pricey

Did not handle stock trades well Very poor and inadequate handling of wash sales, short sales or stock trades multiple brokers. I had to buy another software program and figure out how to integrate those forms with TurboTax. This has been going on for years with TurboTax. Inexcusable. Handled stocks poorly.

Turbo Tax Deductions and Homeowners Deluxe Your steps to fix return did not work in my case. Only errors that showed up were related to when to withdraw money to pay my taxes! Because your program created errors on my return. If you cost me a penalty I will be very angry. Impossible to fix errors on forms. I don't know wheere to go or how to get there. My Federal return has been rejected

Can't be any more complex An example of my annoyance. With foreign income, the software accepts a certain types of entry for state, zip code, employer's Id etc which have to be fictitious. As for example, UK does not have 'states', 'zip codes' and banks there do not have 'ID recognized by IRS'. But having accepted certain 'fake' entries (suggested by your experts) it shows up those as errors and makes it impossible to satisfy the software and reach the end for filing. It is downright stupid and wastage of my valuable time to sort out. Ask you software guys to change the program to make it remember the entries accepted during the main preparation and not to flag those as errors at the end. What is the use of using this software if the program is so dumb and does not help the poor tax preparer to overcome this problem not of his creation? Very unfortunate. Very long winded. Childish way to direct the tax preparation with pictures of experts - serves no purpose.
No discount Signed up with my employer, due to was promissed discount. However after completing tax returnes was charged full price and no discount were given. confusing how to input ssi income

Great Software...couple of glitches If you list your home office business use as less than 100%, the TurboTax worksheet for IRS Form 8829 incorrectly calculates the depreciation limit and makes the allowable depreciation artificially low by not allowing the full net income from your schedule C, plus or minus appropriate adjustments. TTax calculation worksheet needs to be rewritten for this to correctly calculate the allowable depreciation limit for the home office deduction. Turbo tax will NOT allow you to efile your taxes if you make any manual override corrections on any of the tax forms, so I could not initially efile my taxes and had to get a tax professional to efile an extension request (because Turbo Tax will not even allow efiling an extension request if you have an entry that is manually overridden on a tax form)-- VERY FRUSTRATING! Otherwise, I've had pretty good success with the software, other than a couple of times where the data from a correction did not carry through to make corrections on all necessary data fields, until I went back through and figured another way to work through the problem and get it fixed. Home Office Deduction section has glitches/errors, in some cases.

HORRIBLE use H&R way better! filed for years using TT & H&R had a rejection from H&R was easy to fix. This year TT Rejected 5 times not clear why still rejected and says better to mail then I shouldnt have paid to file as federal was free you pay for state. I think H&R next year and recommend using H&R. when rejected not clear on fix

Next year may need something more expen$ive TT Deluxe used to do everything I needed. Standard forms 1040, Sch ABCD. It asked me to upgrade to premier for rental and stocks? Deluxe used to handle it just fine. Good thing people complained, and I got the free upgrade after patching TT. I'll be checking a little closer next year, because I know it will cost closer to $100, instead of $50. Nickel and Dimed for the upgrades.

Not happy I was very disappointed. Previously I bought turbotax and downloaded CD to my computer. This way you payed for federal return and got a free state return. This year I decided to prepare my taxes on line and after I filled out everything I was charged for both federal and state returns even though I could not e-file state. My only options were to pay and file or erase all information put into my state return and begin over. I will not do this again and probably won't use turbotax next year because of this.

column1: I have used TurboTax for several years but I was very dissatisfied this year. Was charged extra fee for state but was unable to e-file.

column2: Hidden fees - Will never use again After spending almost 2 hours getting everything in the tax form, they say I HAVE to upgrade and pay $55 to submit. I reluctantly agree, then they add a $35 transfer fee for my depost. It's a bunch of BS and I'll never use this service again. Added $90+ worth of fees at end

Disappointed I'm a big fan of TurboTax. I've been using it for decades. Once you start using it it's easy to get "hooked" because you get familiar with the process (i.e. the software), and also it "auto populates" a lot of your data from the previous year which makes it easier to fill out the forms, and provides automatic current-to-previous year comparisons.

column1: Now the bad news.

(1) The software "auto-populated" my AGI from 2013 as a means of identifying me and doing the electronic signature at the end of the return, right before filing. It entered the wrong number, and my return got rejected. I did not check the number before filing because I have learned to trust the software to get it right. If you can't trust your tax software to do math right, and move data between locations, what can you trust?

(2) I chose to NOT e-file a State return. TurboTax's instructions for paper filing a State return were lousy. They gave the impression of being intentionally confusing. I can only presume the intention because their instructions everywhere else are quite clear. Are they trying to drive business to e-filing state in order to collect the $25 fee?
(3) A mailing address in the State return instructions was wrong. Fortunately I caught it by reading the State return before mailing.
I will use TurboTax again, but it should be better than this by now. These problems are bush league stuff. The 2014 version had at least one bug, and one intentionally imposed difficulty..

column2: H&R block is a way better product and has more support. I will be returning to their product next year.

Well, not so sure I did my taxes on April 135h, then found they had not filed. So I refiled on April 17th and both Fed and state were rejected. They said the Payer's Federal ID numbers were wrong. So I rechecked my print out and found I had the right ID numbers. What happened? I don't know. Anyway, I am refiling now.

really you force to have the business now Maybe it is time to start looking at other options. I can have a professional prepare my taxes and file them for what it cost to buy turbotax and pay the state e-file.

column1: I think turbotax is is over stepping it's value and I would not recommend anyone not using turbotax to start! For those of us that have used it... well it depends how painful it is. cost

column2: Disapointment this year Needed upgrade and was charged, auto upgrade did not work, so needed a person to person exchange which took extra time(she was great and helpful), 2014 did not pull data from 2013 so had to type all data again, why not put up an outline of areas to be covered and catagory so I could organize data ahead of time? Bought Delux as always, and needed to upgrade to Premium. Costco promised a free upgrade after 7/Feb and was charged f

Return turbotax user, will never use again! All I can say is turbo tax quality has steadily declined in quality and important information. Last year I had to file an amended return because turbo tax missed an $8000.00 deduction. This year an error in e-filing my returns resulted in several hours of frustrating time spent following their online instructions trying resolve the issue. The final snag was when they told me to call their customer service but failed to furnish a telephone number.

column1: After another delay I finally was given an Incident ID # and a phone number. After receiving a call back from Jam, who was a big help, the problem was finally resolved. THANK YOU JAN! Doesn't include include major state deductions

column2: Removed All of the Data I had to redo my taxes THREE times because your TurboTax Premier Program kept removing the data that I had entered.

column1: I would save after I finished entering my data and later when I tried to open the program I would get the Program but there would be NO DATA..

Also, in previous years it was much easier to check where the entries came from by double clicking on an entry.Not so much now. I miss the IRS instructions that used to be included in the Program. Used to be much more user frindly

column2: Have always been a fan but......+ Have heard of other people's tax returns unable to file do to duplicate SSN. I am in the process of investigating but if the problem points to Turbo Tax- will NOT be using again and will be talking to others telling them of my experience. If I find out that it was NOT a Turbo Tax issue then will continue to use. Further investigating is pending. Maybe a 5 star rating is coming but not yet. when I went to e-file- said there was another return already submitted with my SSN.

completely screwed up electronic filing Electronic filing for state and federal did not go thru. Email from TurboTax said go back and we'll show you how to fix it. Went back. Tried online address for IRS they gave, It repeatedly said, "You cannot apply online for pin." Then I tried phone number for IRS, seven times over three days. It never got past entering the birthdate before it hung up. Went back to Turbo Tax after each of these. No contact person, no one to talk to, just referred me to online forums. Then tried entering AGI for last year, again, no luck, and again TurboTax just sent me back to same page on turbotax. Why would turbotax expect that the same thing that didn't work five times would all of a sudden work. Had to file by paper. Meanwhile, don't know if my credit card payments from TurboTax went thru or not. Used this 11 years in a row and will NEVER use it again. see below
not enough time allowed between confirmation code an signing back in

REJECTED Till this week I thought Turbo Tax was great. Now my return will be late. It got rejected no matter how I tried, per your online choices. Every method failed. I've never been late before. NOW WHAT? Rejected every time.

Disappointed This Year I have always liked TurboTax since I started using it several years ago. However, this year's filing has been a disaster! First time around, I ccompleted the entire filing and paying information, but for some reason, TurboTax didn't complete the process. So, I redid the entire filing, paying, etc. process again. Today, 4/17, I checked my tax return to find out that it was rejected. I do not know why, but I had to go through the entire process again, after obtaining a different PIN number. I am extremely upset at this whole debacle. I am a retired, disabled person of 70 years and I do not need this added aggrevation. Too many filing problems
There is no an easy way to update information from prior year once it has been done.

column1: My specific scenario: I started 2014 tax return and I was not done with 2013. It transfer the information from 2013 but when I finally finished the 2013 tax, they information on 2014 still does not reflect the changes made.
Your software does need to create a bottom to update information from prior years to address my point here. Update information from prior year

column2: Potential for Excellence... but.. The product was excellent up until it was time to file. At that point in time everything fell apart. There were JavaScript errors that popped up when trying to connect. Having a technical background I could figure out how to get past those and click the connect button. Once I clicked the connect button it appeared the screen froze - i.e. no reaction.

column1: I called tech support and received my call back. I was told it would be a 45 min wait it was over an hour and a half. When the person finally did call me, she read the issue description and told me it should not have been in her queue. She attempted to transfer me and dropped the call.
During this I brought the screen back up and came to the realization it hadn't froze, it was just extremely slow and it finally acknowledged logon.
Very disappointing experience trying to file.
Others had also reported the JavaScript errors Issues during submission process

column2: I normally like Turbo but! Have been having an ordeal with my 1040 and three days later I am not sure if the 1040 I filed was ever accepted by the IRS. From the very first it told me I already filed and it has rejected my return five additional times. Makes me suspect that someone else may have filed a return using my SS# either maliciously or by accidentally. I guess I will find out soon enough. Hope it is not too costly or difficult to finalize. Could not get my copy of Turbo to do a 1041 for me. Had to do it the old fashioned way.

started great and ended up in the dumpster Turbo Tax Case #412133980 - Katina was absolutely wonderful after calling me when I left my number. She stuck with me through and through. Then we were cut off before we were finished and she did not call me back although She had the number because SHE had called me in the beginning. I went ahead and finished and am praying that my IL tax return is not rejected again. If she had called me back, I would not be telling you that there were a couple times when I felt she was trying to get rid of me by giving me wrong information and I had to point out why she was wrong. I had spent a long time trying to fix the rejected IL return myself before I called you. It did not go smoothly and I found the instructions confusing. I truly was surprised that Katina did not call me back because she was patient with me up until she cut me off and I would have given her a great review, if the return was accepted, of course. Illinois was rejected and I spent hours trying to fix, then called you.

wish it was better I thought the program itself for gathering information was good, I think the price was way too high. Also included way too many ads for additional services. When I was finished and found I owed Federal Taxes they still asked me how I wanted my refund. Then when the program asked me how I wanted to pay my taxes due they did not allow me to say I will arrange this with the IRS. This is the first year I have owed taxes in a long time and I will have to work out payments with the government. too expensive and too many ads for more services
You tried to screw me by leaving certain sections out of the delux version! Do that again and I will leave torbo tax after 12 years!

column1: Do you get it! Confusing after working on basic system and the working on the provide upgrade!

column2: Not Good I hated my experience using Turbo Tax this year. I usually use HR Block. Turbo Tax was confusing and not simple. I was charged for the premium edition in order to proceed to filing. There was no other option even though it CLAIMED free federal return. I was charge $59 for something i didn't want. I didn't even see anything to click on which approved this $59. Even filing the state return was only supposed to be $29 but got included with this $59. Then after weeks of wondering where my return money was, i login and find out the system didn't actually "file" the return. When last time i logged out it was COMPLETE and FILED from what I could see. Not simple. Very confusing and not consistent. Confusing, and misleading
confusing my state file was rejected. they had a button click to fix. it was the worst. it didnt do it and was very confusing. no help at all.

Took advantage of me I got upgraded mid taxes to the small home and business version because it was telling me I had over $100 in expenses (which was only my license fee and fee for insurance), but then never gave me the option to enter it. This cost me $50 more for nothing. On top of that, I have 2 dependents, one of which the other parent claimed as per our legal agreement, but this program still tried to claim him on the EIC this having my return rejected. When I pressed the option to have it fix the errors, it didn't fix anything and just refiled. I ended up having to delete my son altogether just so his ss# wouldn't appear on the schedule EIC. Upgraded me unnecessarily for $50 then couldn't fix errors.

Frustratedtaxpayer So tired of dealing with this. Why should I pay so much money for such a mess? I should get my money back from Turbo Tax for the problems that I have experienced this year. I have been trying to get this done, called for help, and still cannot get my taxes to go through. Now I have to worry about my personal information being stolen? Too much BS!!!!! no help

So annoyed! There seems to be an error within either IRS or Turbo Tax and even though I keep verifying and VERIFYING it keeps getting returned. WHERE THE HECK is Turbo Tax to help me now? Why does this keep happening? What am I supposed to do??????? can't file my return
Cannot E-File - 10 Attempts "We will help you FIX it" does NOT work - I eventually had to mail my tax! Failed to eFile - no adequate assistance

Less than stellar performance In the past, if I had an error in filing, and got rejected returns, the software would allow hands-on repairs, if necessary, to facilitate refiling. Never had a problem until this year, when the error was not corrected 5 times. I had to delete the info manually, by digging through reams of FAQ's and a long arduous process. The auto-repair "Fix-It-Now" button was not working at all! Won't auto-correct the error in filing, even after 5 attempts.

home & business this was all-full took at least 5 hours to get some to print for me to file call for help o 4 17 15 had to have everything print thru adobe COULD NOT GET IT TO PRINT OUT T TAX FILE SKIP/

It was nice to be able to do taxes my taxes mysel I bought Turbotax Deluxe because our taxes are very simple. At least I thought they were. We own several MLP's and had some equity sales. II found out I needed to upgrade to Turbotax Premier at a cost of $32.03. I understood I would get a rebate of $25.00 when I filed my taxes. I saw no place to get this rebate when I filed my taxes.

column1: I paid $59.99 when I bought Deluxe 1/5/2015. A short time later it was advertised that Premier was only $54.99 (it was much more expensive when I bought Turbotax).
It took forever to download the Premier upgrade. You did a big disservice to your users by failing to include the additional features for investment income.
The box Deluxe came in said there was 1 State product via download ( Print free or e-file for $19.99. When I went to e-file state taxes it said it would cost $24.95
I used Turbotax a number of years ago, then went to a CPA. Our tax situation has gotten much less complicated and I decided to use Turbotax again.
It really was a pain to deal with this year to get started. I sincerely hope you get the versions straightened out before 2015 tax filing.

HOW DO GET THE REBATE FOR HAVING TO UPGRADE TO PREMIER??? and the aggravation of having to download it??? Very difficult to download updates when I first got it. Site was so slow it shut me out several times.

column2: REJECTED I've always used TurboTax in the past with no problems. That being said, this year I've had nothing but trouble. My file has been rejected at least 6 times and TurboTax supposedly helps correct it, but it keeps coming back rejected for the same error Doesn't work this year

This is frustrating This program does a terrible job of letting you see how the forms are being filled out as you go. Also, it incorrectly filled in a box on the state return (for something that I did not have and never input any information) so that the return gets rejected. Then, this program does not let you manually correct the box, so you end up having to mail in the return. What's the point? Incorrectly filled in state return and then cannot fix it so it gets rejected

Terrible with NYS Taxes Get through the Federal and NYS Taxes with no errors - try to efile and can't... Federal Return shows as being filed - but I file NYS. Have to print out both returns and mail them - because I am thinking neither return efiled correctly. Called TT help - it was terrible. I have been using this product for over 15 years - next year I won't. NY State E-Filing Problems

no Customer service Turbo tax took my money to file and would not submit the return. there was no way to contact a customer service rep to address the problem. Totally non responsive to multiple requests. waste of money and time. totally non responsive to requests for service

SIGNING IN INTO ACCOUNT I DON'T LIKE THE WAY YOU SETUP FOR VERIFING WHO YOUR ARE WHEN IN THE PASS WHEN YOU SIGN WITH YOUR USER PASSWORD AND STUFF IT WORKED WITH OUT A PROBLEM. THIS YEAR YOU CHANGED YOUR SYTEM TO AS QUESTIONS. AFTERING THE QUESTIONS RIGHT IT STILL WOULD NOT LET ME IN. SO I HAD TO CREATE A NEW USER ID AND PASSWORD AND NOW I GET MY RECORDS BACK AND THAT SUCKS I HAD TO CREATE A NEW USER PASSWORD
was nt very helpful with questions about being double charged for a free service...not doing this again

Did not recognize 2013 filing. Have confirming emails demonstrating I clearly used TT.. Omission made 2014 filing difficult as one cannot "redo"2013 to create, i.e. won' permit filling forms from hard cc I kept.

column1: Then, print out of 2014 did not include MO Est. Tax forms 1<4 So I'm late w/ 1st payment. I have made requests of TT in other surveys for forms, but no response.
So I'm late w/ 1st payment.

column2: Inflexible Turbo Tax Although Turbo-tax is good for most normal circumstances, it is a very inflexible tool for inputs. Examples:

column1: --It did not allow for straight line depreciation on rentals or other items, that were started years ago
--It does not allow accurate valuations of land or other assets, if they seem too high (even if used previously with IRS), so does not match current real estate values in many cases.
--I was unable to fill out a schedule E properly, so had to include the data in other schedules.

Bottom Line is that in many cases you cannot input your actual data if it does not match their parameters, regardless of why. Strict limits on data inputs--not allowed to input special circumstances within tax rules

column2: ????? I have doubts about some results Not as clear as previous years,

an4a can't use paid version without an american credit card, the free version doesn't want to input foreign income; wasted time to input information to find out at the end that can't file; still can't pay without american cc

This year turbo tax freedom alliance lost my respect in changing the way they do things. Turbo Tax: 1) no longer allows access to previous year returns without an extra $30, 2) did this freaky 'what's wrong? How do you feel @ doing your taxes now?' thing with the screen when I got frustrated and wanted to bail AND THEY WOULDN'T LET ME LOG OUT!!!! 3) ad pushed throughout most of the process trying to up-sell services and gift cards etc 4) kept asking for the $30 just to turn to blade some more reminding me the service won't ever be the same again...WHAT A TURN OFF!!!! This was one of the few things I thought I could still rely on being the same reliable safe, free place that it was. What a disappointment. changed to: ad pushing, upselling and no more access to your own returns w/out $$$$

Refund done overall I like the ease of use of the application and be able to do it at my pace but do not like all the pop ups that I "can't do that" without upgrading and spending more money. would not let me do certain things w/out upgrading...again

Turbo Tax got it wrong, and there's no one to talk 1. If you receive a distribution from HSA when you had no HDHP plan, even though you used the entire distribution for qualified medical expenses, TurboTax added it to taxable income. That is wrong! Verified that with an H&R Block specialist, and then further verified it with IRS publication.

column1: 2. Posted a question, got no help.

3. Plan to change to H&R Block next year...I suspect TurboTax makes me pay more tax than I need to. 1. Incorrect handling of HSA distributions for qualified expenses. 2. No help when asking for clarification.

column2: Down a rabit hole. Problem last year with program, had to have professional do taxes Some situations seem to be unfixable when making changes on a rejected return

Experience was poor, cost was high The transaction between TurboTax and the IRS is very poor. My stress is huge right now because I can't get the two entities to talk. TurboTax thinks I have one AGI, the Government doesn't agree but I can't get the AGI. First the link get the ePin won't complete and says it can't be provided online at this time. The IRS phone number then says I don't need a PIN this year (yep it did) so trying to enter last years AGI which TurboTax enters automatically.... but it doesn't match the IRS. So try to put in 0 as the Government says but it still rejects. This isn't a convenience it's a blind battle with nobody to contact. I think your site Sucks! Still trying to submit... two days after the 15th
Cannot e file state taxes I could not file my state electronically, the web page could not be accessed, no phone numbers were listed to call inability to e file state taxes

the worst taxes rejected 3 times - after sitting on hold forever, Turbotax promised to send a link for a new PIN, they never did. They also said they were open until 11pm last night, they closed at 5. What's up with the lies and lack of customer service? failure to provide customer service, lies
Great up till e-filing I have a printed receipt for the EFT on the 14th and returns printed and DONE. When I look at the program on the 17th, TWO DAYS LATE, it shows I haven't efiled (!!!)

column1: I just finished it now. MAYBE. Who knows??? Let me go on the 15th THINKING I've FILED!!!!

column2: duplicate ssn file already all well except duplicate ssn already filed msg all well except duplicate ssn already filed msg

Expensive software I have used this product for many years now. I have a home business and I found this year I could no longer use the Deluxe version. Instead I was forced to use TurboTax Home & Business. The software is substantially more money and while Intuit laughed all the way to the bank, I was out substantially more money. The $25 rebate does not help since it will likely be difficult to get and I just filed my taxes on 15-April. I'll be using another product for filing next year. This is one customer Intuit will not get back. Yes, they are a big company and I am a little taxpayer. But my decision and people like me will have an impact on their bottom line and that's all businesses care about - lining their pockets with money - not their customers. I rarely take the time to write reviews, but I'm absolutely furious about this year's "pricing error". The software is too expensive for home business users

Frustration! E-file submissions on the 15th were rejected by IRS. Several attempts to correct, using steps specified by TurboTax, were unsuccessful, including waiting one hour on the phone for IRS to help. They could not. Have to file by mail and, now,late! No TurboTax advice on what to do about NY state requirement that e-filing is mandatory. Will mail it and hope. No response from help question submitted. Difficulty of use.

charged for items not wanted or used,couldn't geth Credit card charged for daughter's, Jillian Cather-Barth NOT Processed and Sent when Found DIDN'T NEED TO FILE BUT MY CREDIT CARD WAS STILL CHARGED! ! REFUND ASAP!! APP FROZE AT FINAL "PRINT FORMS" TO MAIL IN ALONG WITH EFILES! ADDED ITEMS DIDNT WANT AND WOULDN'T REMOVE - COPIES OF CERT FEDERAL! HOPE NOT CHARGE AS WHEN KEPT GOING TO DATE AT END PUT - 01/01/1900 & NO YEARS LISTED ON THAT FORM!!

column1: CAROL CATHER
joesangel66@gmail.com add not wanted then cant remove, froze wont show/print,daugh's canceled,not procdDIDNT NEED 2FILE MY CR CARDCHARGED

column2: Satisfaction Plummeted We were unable to successfully file, apparently because we need a special PIN, but we were unable to navigate the system to obtain one. Maybe this is an IRS fail, but we were initially told it was accepted. This is very frustrating. This year--fail.

Continued Creative Price Gouging Any opportunity to gouge an extra dollar out of you, be sure Intuit has thought of it, and added it. This is the 10th year I have used TurboTax and it consistently gets worse and worse. I spent $70 on the CD this year instead of doing it directly over the internet, thinking it would be a once and done cost.... WRONG. Another $24.99 if you want to e-file state taxes. It says e-filing the Federal taxes is free, but it will only allow this option if you pay the $24.99 to e-file the state taxes. If you want to use your refund to cover that fee, it'll cost you an additional $39.99. Definitely the used car salesman of the tax prep industry. Feel dirty after using it

Somewhat Difficult I really struggled with stock transactions this year. In prior years I was walked through all of the details of different stock transactions. This year they were all originally put in as a regular stock transaction and I had to search for a way to designate an RSU, NQSO and ESPP transaction. I am not sure what changed but it really took me a lot longer to do my taxes this year with Turbo Tax compared to the last 15 or so years. I have to admit I was frustrated. I had to really search for information and the guide was not helpful with stock transactions

Idiot proof? I'm currently on my 3rd attempt to file. Having problems identifying the correct e-Filing PIN to use. Then going to the IRS phone service for Pin problem they tell you to enter 0 for AIG. I'm still not confident it will be accepted this time.

column1: Handling stock options, short sales and futures transactions were all very vague and confusing.

Not sure if I ended up with the same deduction in differently places. - it would be nice if deductions would have had an item summary of the for the entire filing. Very weak on investment handling and then providing visibility of what's imported

column2: Not sure how $59 became $89 I selected the $59 package and ended up paying $89. I'm not sure I like the idea of a company filing my taxes for me if they don't realize that 59 and 89 are different numbers. deception

Disappointed Both my returns were rejected for the first time in 6 years. I don't understand the reason why and I definitely couldn't fix it now as you suggested. There are no errors on my returns, I most definitely know my social security number and every other number that I had to input into your system was checked at least 3 times before my forms were submitted. No live contacts when you have issues

I have used turbotax for at least 15 years I have used turbo tax every year. I did my daughters taxes a couple of weeks ago and no fee was charged...for STATE AND FEDERAL. Then today my daughters friend did hers due to our recommendation and she was surprised to see two fees. That was very unfair to young ladies who are trying to make it out on their own...sorry to say other services will be used next year.. thanks for all of your help. 2 fees !

Duplicated a school I attended After waiting for some time for my electronic return I double check my tax information and found that turbotax had duplicated a school I attended resulting in my return being inflated. Now I have to send the amended return and wait probably 3 months for a return and hope I don't get audited. have to send a amended tax return and wait for my money back

Problems I spent over one hour with one of your customer reps (who was very friendly and helpful); however, the software didn't break out my wages/income very well. I was on active duty in the military for half the year. I was stationed in Virginia, but was a resident of California. My wife was a resident of Virginia for half the year and Nebraska for half the year. I was also a resident of Nebraska for half the year. With the help of your rep I manually had load my wages/income into the Ne tax return...a bit complicated.

column1: Next, I filled several hours before the deadline and found out none of my returns were accepted due to one small EIN typo. Apparently now I have to pay multiple late fees and send the Virginia file by snail mail. I feel I should not have to pay multiple late fees due to the typo. If I filed by snail mail and had the same typo, I wouldn't have to pay such fees. Didn't easily break out income from different states

column2: FRAUD DEPARTMENT IS HORRIBLE I needed to contact the Fraud Department because my return was rejected. It appears my SS number has been compromised. The first time I was sent to the Fraud Section, I waited for 45 minutes. I hung up, called again and was transferred to the Fraud section again. This time I held for 55 minutes and no one ever picked up. Finally, I called again and the CSR I talked with said that he would check to see what the wait time would be--he came back and said, "they told me it would be about 15 minutes." Their concept of 15 minutes does not equal the 40 minutes I was on hold AGAIN. I hung up and have not called them since. Length of wait time (55 minutes for 3 times) to talk with someone in your Fraud Dept. Waiting this long is unacceptable.

Payment for TurboTax As one of hundreds of thousands (millions?) of US citizens living outside the US, I couldn't pay for TurboTax with my credit card because Intuit still doesn't accept payment by credit cards outside the US. I urge Intuit to accept payment from non-US credit cards (or PayPal or other methods). Can't pay with a credit card outside US

Disappointing Used Turbotax for years with no problems. Now I try to file and cannot because it's "determining my best filing option" for hours at a time until Turbotax finally times out. What's better is that when I attempt to contact Turbotax for support, not only do my inquiries go unanswered, I discover other Turbotax users have experienced the same problem with no response or help from Turbotax as well. Tax season is stressful enough without having to deal with Turbotax's technical problems or lack of support. I eventually had to use a less sucure connection to complete my taxes, therefore I WILL be suing Turbotax should ANY of my confidential information be corrupted... In the end, to Turbotax, all I've left to say is fix it or take it offline! When all's said and done, it won't file!!!

BIG (POOR) CHANGES FROM LAST YEAR WHEN FINALLY COMPLETING THE FORM, FILING WAS DIFFICULT AND I ENDED UP FILING A SECOND TIME WITH NO RECOGNITION THAT I HAD FILED BEFORE 4/15. IF THERE IS A PENALTY, I WILL EXPECT TURBOTAX TO COVER IT.. TRANSPARANCY

Dazed and Confused First off I selected the "DELUXE" instead of the "FREE" and never caught my mistake. My dad paid for everything because I didn't have the money and then we found an error I had made #fat fingers#. After paying there was no way to fix the error or ask for his money back because there is no contact numbers. We ended up :AMENDING" the return and mailing it in and now I'm writing this review. Next item is if the system will let me log out without telling me that I haven't finished yet. Picked wrong and a mistake; Couldn't fix easily
There was no option to print the tax forms There was no option to print the tax forms now it will cost 50 dollars to do?! what the heck?

Too expensive Turbo tax is easy to use but I would not recommend it to others due to high price especially for state. I will be moving on finally after paying such a high price to other servicers similar to turbo tax that are way less expensive. cost too much

Whatever happened to assistance? Since downloading multiple states (Virginia, Georgia, Ohio), never got Georgia state return to work. Till April 15, Georgia never did work. Sent numerous messages to Intuit, but never received a response. I was aware that earlier Georgia was not accepting electronic returns, but I thought that matter was cleared up. If not, why didn't Intuit refund me for downloading it? Never got Georgia to work

When I call Customer Support I should not have to talk to an automated system and then wait for a human being. The program should have worked without me having to call the 800. I will not search a database for an error I didn't cause. You people have problems if people were filing state tax returns with prior years data. You need to be performing flawlessly. Had to call Customer Support

Disappointed Will be using Hand R Block next year. Was not sure which version I needed and spent more time figuring that out than I did doing my taxes. Sorry Turbo Tax. You've lost my business. to many versions - confusing
Bad Experience I used wrong id#'s for employers... Hard time correcting mistakes
Not a fan I spent quite a lot of time trying to fix an error, but was not sent to the proper form to change.

column1: I'm not sure how I finally got through but I was rejected by my state for the first time in over 10 years. could not access forms to review and change

column2: Terrible!!!! I did my parents tax return. I use another company for mine and it was so much easier! This took me forever to do. And then it just shut down just before we were ready to file. Will not use again. Not to mention it was more expensive!!!!!!

Never Again I've used TurboTax for several years, that now has ended. The program would not let me download the state that I needed to complete the state return. I had to file an extension so I could get the information together to file a paper claim. I paid for the Turbotax, the $39 for the state download and did not receive the product. You have to help numbers, only an online answer board which is completely useless. I will never use it again and everyone I know, I will recommend not using it. It's a bad product. It would not allow me to download the state forms
expensive but decent  over one hundred dollars, inter-app marketing for Amazon and a credit card is inappropriate

Three Steps Backwards I've been working on my taxes for the last two days, and although I submitted my federal taxes, I can't get my state taxes submitted electronically. Today is one day after the deadline, and still no luck. Regardless of what I do, I continue to receive this error message"

column1: Check This Entry
Hidden Right for Me Worksheet:Deduction for health plan is not between the prescribed upper and lower limits.
This is Tax Software, so why would a company develop tax software, that will display an error message and NOT provide a highlighted field that lets the customer know where the error is.

The worksheet that opens in the TT window, doesn't contain any data or information related to Health Plan deduction. If there is an error with the Health Plan deduction, why doesn't the window with Health Plan deductions open.
I don't see anything wrong with my Health Plan deductions because I don't have a High Deductible Insurance plan.
I called and spoke to a TT rep, and the issue is still not resolved. I can't file my State Taxes electronically.

I paid $48.00 for the Deluxe TT software, and the software doesn't allow me to electronically submit my taxes for my state. It seems like the TT product is going down hill pretty fast. I'm not sure if there are others out there that have experienced the same problem as I have, but this is extremely annoying, to say the least. Can't Submit My Georgia State Taxes

column2: I am completely finished with your product, but your software is still needlessly slowing down my computer by running useless processes. Your Intuit software is garbage that should be classified as a virus, instead of any kind of helpful program. DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT, you will regret it. (It is on the same level as McAfee)

Screws something up every year Almost every year there seems to be some error that needs to be fixed when it goes into the review process, and there is usually no guidance to fix it, and this year the error made ZERO sense, and it took forever to figure out how to fix it.

column1: Next year I'll be using a competing software. Minor, non-sensical errors

column2: Poor extension from last year, will probably evalu  Not sure my file was submitted and when I checked it did not appear that it had . BOO HISS
Needs some improvements I've tried TT several times over the years. As far as I'm concerned its 95% great. 5% garbage.

column1: Theres always something that the software misses. A transposed number that throws the math off. A question that wasn't answered, etc. Even though it double and triple checks your info, it still seems to find a way to miss things.

Ex. There are multiple places where you put in a SSN. I had numbers transposed in 1 out of the 4 places and TT never compared the numbers to catch any of the mistakes. Same with other numbers that you have to type in more than once.
WAY too many commercials. They have value but for me, NOT MUCH.
Other than that I like the program. Easy to use. Easy to make mistakes. WAY too many adds and too much room for error

column2: 2014 turbotax— NO FUN! in fact, disturbingly bad! turboTax Delux has been a great program for DIY tax preparers, such as me. i've used it for 15 years or more. it's great in that it carries over data I've input from year to year, so i don't have to start from scratch. this year, it was bizarre asking me to download free upgrades to Premier, and HOme and business…which required a lot of data reentry.

column1: then it was missing the handy sidebar that let me select which page i want to work on. overall it took me way longer than normal to do this annual chore. this year's a loser: DELUXE has worked for me for years. this time "free" upgrades asked data to be reentered many times

column2: Corrections fails to work I had my return rejected for a typographical error. I logged into TurboTax to fix the error, and clicked the 'fix my return' button. I fixed the error, and resubmitted. Minutes later, I received another rejection notice.

column1: I followed the same steps as before, but this time before transmitting my return, I double checked the actual 1040 file, and the update was never actually applied to the form. I had to actually go into Personal Info to make the correction.

This wouldn't be a big deal, except that I thought that the update from the button would actually make the correction. Big Bug, would rather you just told me to fix the issue, instead of making me think the button link would actually do what it intended.
Multiple issues this year with core functionality. I will likely use H&R next year. Corrections link doesn't update the informationr

column2: TURBO TAX COMMENTS The state of California doesn't have Locality Name. Therefore, Turbo Tax wouldn't let me e-file on time. Turbo Tax should have "XXX" for example for states w/o Locality Name. You took my money, but wouldn't let me e-file. Now I have to pay a penalty for filing late. Turbo Tax should pay this penalty, not me! No Guidance as to "Locality Name" for Block 20 on W2-G form.

Partnership sale on wrong form Sold shares in partnership. Broker reported sale, but entering sale through K1 entries put it as a category F sale, nothing reporting. I could not change this. Hard to make some changes

E-file Rejected I have used Turbo Tax to do my families taxes for multiple years and have never had a problem. All of my previous returns allowed me to use the free addition; however for 2014 I was not able to use the free version for State so I had to pay $29.95. Well this was also the first time my taxes have been rejected when e-filing. Of course the issue has to do with the TIN error so you cannot e-file; you have to file by paper. Part of me feels like even though I paid to be able to efile my State that somehow the rejection was caused by Turbo Tax. Unable to fix rejected claims

Horrible experience If I go through everything, how is it things get missed and need to be edited/corrected? I had a lot of trouble downloading Turbo Tax this year and then pulling it back up again. Really not happy with Turbo Tax this year. most everything

Won't use again I don't understand what has happened with TurboTax. I was a loyal customer and also got many others using the service over the years. However after spending hours (days) preparing my taxes with TT to file my 2013 taxes, the e-filing service repeatedly rejected my filing. After many failed attempts, I ended up having to start all over with another service and ended up filing late as a result. I was not pleased about this, but I gave TurboTax another shot to file my 2014 taxes. Once again, the problem happened with repeated rejections and a lack of adequate advice or solution to remedy the problem. Numerous attempts to get PIN from IRS failed, phone calls failed, entering actual 2013 AIG failed, entering "0" for AIG as advised failed. Once again, the time I put into tax prep and countless failed efilings with TurboTax caused me to have to start all over with another service, again causing my filing to be late. I can no longer rely on this service, and can no longer have my time wasted with errors and redundant work. I will use a different tax prep and efiling method for 2015. Last two years filings repeatedly rejected, causing me to re-do tax prep and file with other service

was not user friendly I make a small mistake regarding and check the wrong box in answer to a question regarding whether or not my IRA was open on Dec 31, 2014. I though it asked if I had opened a Roth IRA by Dec 31, 2104.. I tried to get assistance from turbo tax to find out where I had made a mistake and it was 1 very hard to find the phone # to call.... took three calls and conversations with 3 people to find out the problem.. Also it was hard to get to find out that I had to go to the print center to review my form before I filed my return.. there should be a quick link for viewing and printing your tax forms before you file after you pay the turbo tax fee. too expensive, not user friendly if you check a worong box

I think the filing fee should be removed. We paid for the software so why do we get charged a fee to file too? WIll be looking for a free e-file option next year. Hope it's with Turbo Tax but am prepared to move on... Filing Fee

No live person to talk to! This is the second time I used your services and found it very helpful and easy to follow. Except that this time it will not let me deleted some data entry or make corrections as it still showing that my e-file reject error even after following your steps! Plus, it force me to buy deluxe even when I said I don't have any business. And last, no live person/customer service to talk to!!!!! >:/ But, some glitch will not let you fix the problems

Another tax year bites the dust This year, as those in the past, I've had to complete multiple returns (joint, kid #1, kid#2, ...) and all have been completed with TurboTax. But, completing the kids returns requires information from (a) our joint return and (b) each childs return needs information from the other kids. Since I've been using TurboTax for all of them you'd think that the #'s could be fetched/updated automagically (select parents return, select other childs return, ...). Home sale support weak, Kiddie tax could be more automated, State filing should be free
More work this year  I just hope everything is worked out for next year
2014 return One week later I check on my return. It seems that it never was sent. We are devastated. we finished on 4/11/15
Turbo Tax 2014 Filing late cost money Because of you I filed late

Poor help with deductions Your guidance of how to take a deduction for multiple meals contributed and provided for homeless families of the Family Promise of Lawton, Inc., and multiple meals we provided and contributed for ministry events at the Cameron Campus Ministry, Inc., and multiple meals we contributed and provided for church events at Centenary United Methodist Church for your and ministry events there was no effective and reasonable way to take that deduction. We have receipts for purchase of food and supplies for several contributions in each instance. with multiple times of serving homeless of Family Promise, Inc. and serving students at the Cameron Campus Ministry, Inc

Awful for part year residency I used turbo tax for state part year residency for my husband and I for Virginia and Pennsylvania. I moved to Pennsylvania partway through the year while my husband stayed in VA. Even though I entered my move date and no move date for my husband. Turbo tax could not get it right when it came to attributing my husbands and my income to the right state. Even though I kept checking for an error. I eventually gave up and filed PA return by hand. Also, it would be nice if it had a box to check if you wanted all of a particular income entry attributed to just one state. In addition, for both federal and state, any time I needed to make changes/updates, I had to go through questions irrelevant to the change. You could rarely select just the page you need to change without needing to re-answer questions in that section, which was a real time sink. Terrible for part year state residency. Also, not user friendly for making changes to just one section w/o wasting time

Could not efile due to filing status but no option Unclear instructions: At end of filing, was prompted with the following: "Cannot efile because 'You have claimed your spouse's exemption on a return with a married filing separate status.' " The autofill form must have entered that I was CLAIMING my husband, but I did not claim him. The form must have automatically given the exemption for him. FURTHER, tried to efile State but required a credit card. I used my mother's credit card, THEN was prompted that I could NOT efile State, AFTER CHARGES WENT THROUGH!! You have claimed your spouse's exemption on a return with a married filing separate status.

Over Charged After completing everything, I was able to determine that Home and Business section had zero inputs for my situation. I could have used a less costly version of the software, however the only way to change to a less costly version is to completely delete my original return and start all over. Amazing, TurboTax can transfer all y data when upgrading me to a software version that is higher, but doesn't have the capability to transfer my data to a lower version. recommended a level of product higher than needed

I purchased TurboTax Home and Business version to file taxes for a lawn care business is started last year. When I installed it, for some reason, it thought I had the Premier version and wouldn't let me fill out the section for self-employment. After about 30 minutes on the phone with customer service, they finally resolved this issue. Then when I got to my State return, the program wouldn't download the correct paperwork for my state return. After about an hour on the phone, customer service was finally able to resolve this problem as well. These glitches seem totally unnecessary for a program that has been around this long. Wouldn't properly update.

WOULDNT EFILE STATE!! Due to specific circumstances with my federal, I had to mail it. Program would not allow State to be efiled, as is required in NY, but I didn't realize it didn't efile until the next day. What the heck is this????? The option is there but the program wont allow it to happen. Why my 0 tax situation required me to mail the federal in the first place is incomprehensible and I resent the inconvenience and frustration. This is the first year I have been unsatisfied with the performance and use of TurboTax. TAXES ARE LATE NOW

Annoyed I have been using turbotax for years and every time I file my taxes I choose to fill out all of my information again, using the free edition. Every time they asked me if I wanted to upgrade I said "no." I know you pay $29.99 for state returns but I was also charged another $29.99 for turbotax plus! If I was going to get charged for the plus version I would have used it in the first place and saved some time and energy!
Added cost and inability of software to not show unnecessary or inapplicable deductions make the software unfriendly. too many exceptions
2014 Tax returns comments Overall pretty good. Seems like it could be setup to work more quickly. hard to find quick way to prepare 2015 estimated tax forms and prepare them

Worst experience ever If you need to actually speak with a person, good luck. There is no phone number on the website. Google know their phone number so that helps. I feel hijacked by this process and I have been a customer for years and now I have to go somewhere else.

TurboTax SUCKS! TurboTax used to be my hero, making doing taxes simpler and even fun. Sadly, it really changed for the worse this year, in part because I got married in 2014 (and that opened up a big can of worms in terms of new forms, concepts and absorption of "the marriage penalty"). I used to be able to do my State taxes for free, then print and mail them; now, even after buying TurboTax software, they're charging me to do State taxes with their software, and then charging me again to e-file them. That's taken my $192 refund from Federal taxes to nothing! I expected TurboTax to make doing taxes a breeze, like it had always been in the near 15-years I've been using it. This time, and my last time using TurboTax, it's been a horrendous trip I never want to take again. Next year it will be TaxAct, or get acquainted with a CPA. Not very helpful in the end, where it really matters.

Not free I was unable to file my state taxes for free. This is a misrepresentation of your services. I only made 16k last year. I'm unable to file state with your service and must enter all of my information again into another site. I'm appreciative that you have a federal free file, and that you must make money somehow, but you shouldn't advertise TOTALLY FREE filing if you aren't going to honor it. You tried charging me for state tax prep when you stated it was completely free
sort of Wish I could finish this HARD TO GET INSTRUCTIONS

Charges EXTRA for filing state on-line Purchasing a program that includes state returns does not mean it will file them on-line. You are whacked with another fee. Just beware. I guess they are embarrassed of what they charge and so they attempt to hide it. Typical Intuit. charges extra for filing state on-line...

What Happened to the Product that I Loved? I have been a customer for 6+ years. One of the biggest advantages was being able to compare to a previous year. This year, I did the deluxe version that I started through either Fidelity or Target's benefits website ( I don't recall#. I used my same user ID as previous years but it pulled in less than 10% of my prior years information.#it looked like just part of my data

column1: from my 2013 W2 maybe??# When I looked up a solve, it told me that if I had used a CD last year, that I would not be able to pull in my last year information until I had paid for this year since I started it from the web as a free version - #which it wasn't it was the deluxe version). So, I did pay. Once you had my payment, and tried to load in last year, I received a message that since I had paid, I was no longer able to start over and pull in my last year info. UGH. I had to re-enter in everything - charities, bank and investment info- you took away one of the best features.

My second issue was with the user interface. ICK. I'm not sure if the UI difference was because of not having all the last year info so it defaults to another version, or whether it was updated for all versions, but it is not as comprehensive as before. Some help was improved, providing basic examples which helps. But, the section on HSA is especially bad. It asked me to get information from a form in my 2013 taxes that did not exist. After so many years of loving the product, I am very disappointed. No Last year comparison, not as comprehensive as before, unclear and just plain bad directions and help.

column2: Un able to efile haung up on paying state Could not e-file state taxes - tried blaming my connection, No on to call due your limited business hours

Your program crashed innumerable times. Microsoft closed down my Turbotax '14 innumerable times. Then of course they ask you to send a report to Microsoft. That always got lost in la-la-land necessitating a reboot of the system.

column1: Time lost was immense. Frustration, extreme.
I have no idea why the problem arose this year and not in the past.

Form 8903 was not in the forms list. Turbotax was totally unconcerned that while I reported Domestic Production Activities in prior years, in my initial go through, I had missed it this time. The 8903 deduction turned out to be $5600, as was typical in the recent past returns, yet when I overlooked the interest from a meaningless credit union account, about $25, Turbotax went crazy with reminders. What planet do your programmers live on?

column2: What Happened? I've always been happy with Turbo Tax, but this year I couldn't submit my return. The links provided weren't effective, though I tried three times with the website and three times with the phone number provided. My return was rejected not just once, but twice. I'm having to submit by mail at this point, and it's after April 15th. I don't like being in this position. Now I'm not sure what I'll do next year to avoid this issue in the future. = ( Couldn't submit electronically

Very Disappointed Very disappointed that we had to pay $49.99 twice for filing in the same state. I will not use this program again. I will go back to Taxact Online. Cost of for each state filing (same state)

Used to love turbotax, never again I've used turbo tax for 10 years now, and other than the ever increasing price, had no complaints until this year. It typically takes me about 30 minutes to do both my State and Federal forms, this year it took hours.

column1: This year the major issue was getting stuck in loops where when validating the form I would get "Name should not be entered directly on worksheet" errors. After numerous tries of correcting the error, and multiple logging in and out,, it FINALLY cleared by using the instructions here (https://ttlc.intuit.com/questions/1900432-error-ssn-name-address-etc-should-not-be-entered-directly-on-worksheet)

Then I had a persistent error where it wanted me to correct entries on form 2555, Foreign Earned Income Exclusion. That was scary as all get out because I have never had any foreign earned income whatsoever. All of my W2s did not show any at all, and the provided help to search in the income section for it got me nowhere. There simply was no mention of it at all.
I eventually just deleted all of the entries out of the 2555 form manually.

Fortunately, I am due a small refund, so will not be penalized for filing a day late, but essentially in 2015, I just paid $124 for the privilege of wasting hours fighting errors. Never again. Endless error loops, and problems

column2: Turbo tax is a efficient way to file taxes. My only complaint is I received a thank you for filing and with a E pin #, however my payment was never deducted from my account and today I went back in and resent it with another saying the federal return had been accepted with the new date being today 4-16-15. I do not want to have to pay a penalty for late payment when it was filed 2 months ago.
disappointed in fee Why wasn"t your fee for last year listed in the deductions?

column1: Why was this year more complicated with the royalty income?

column2: Retired I can't decide whether you are victims of your own success or, you've become yet another prime example of the Peter Principle. Thank God I'm retired. In forty+ years of senior corporate Management, its sad to report that the causes, the symptoms, and typically the end result are obvious to everyone who doesn't fall under that harness..

column1: For openers, you're focusing on trying to squeeze your core competency into a multi-revenued monster with products and business which only seem on the surface to be compatible. Not at all common after a buy-out with the buyer trying to 1.) Force the acquired into its existing mores and practices. Management see a bump in revenues, get their 8 figure bonuses, loose all interest in the "newbies" in favor of potential higher rewards where they perceive the grass to be greener. And, of course, strap with a restrictive budget short on training and successfully integration. The streets are adrift with legions of, what were, huge potential companies and executive talent, now tarnished.

2.) You've lost intimate contact wit your customers. Both last year, and then (sadly again) this year problems arose with my returns that one, or maybe two, short phone calls would have resolved the issues and we could have all moved on. Ever try to contact one of the people working on your returns. Can't be done. What's sad is that its obvious your system was structured that way. No direct phone numbers numbers, fax numbers, or addresses for any kind of direct access. Tsk Tsk....shame on you. Customers never develop brand loyalty to tightly controlled, response only emails. When you lose direct customers, even loving control, you lose that customer because you never established loyalty in the first place. Ask Lee Iacocca, Warren Buffet, Phil Jackson. Yes, yes, I know that rarely those this kind of philosophies steal into any curriculum at the Harvard Business School, that's such a pity.

There are dozens of signals that you and your people that the coarse you've recently embarked on just doesn't" look good" on you. Bait and switch marketing on captive customers doesn't sit well with customers who are under a fair amount of stress in the first place. I'd wager that a fair number of them buy that only remotely stuff just to grt you to quit pester them and GET BACK TO WHY HE'S THERE. Its reminiscent of kicking a guy when he's down. You'd never see John Wayne do that. Peace..... What happed to that company.Maybe I'll find them next year once more.

column2: Have a ways to go to simplify State Tax Filing PA State tax software had long-running script issues that made it hard to go from page to page when I clicked on 'continue.'

column1: I had difficulty purchasing the state software, because intuit did not recognize my e-mail address as a user ID.

I don't understand why TurboTax does not keep track of carryover expenses from year to year, or at the very least, tell you where to find them by line number on your Fed & State submitted forms. What's the point of using the same software each year if it doesn't remember/transfer these types of data from the last tax year to the current tax year?
Fed Tax software is better, more user friendly, except for the depreciation/capital improvements area.
Usually the call center has helpful individuals ... it just takes a while to get a hold of one or have them call back. State Tax questions are confusing/unclear, not explained well

column2: Pain in the Neck TurboTax really dropped the ball this year. The software was easy to follow but I had to call several times. I couldn't file state taxes without calling for a code and making my payment over the phone. I filed 2 individuals taxes so that was 2 calls made. I needed to upgrade to premier (which TT gave me for free) but I had to call for a code before I could do it. One call took 2 hours! The customer service staff were always helpful and friendly and this is no reflection on them. But the actual product stinks. Had to call for codes everytime I wanted to do something; like file a state return!
Much more challenging to use TT this year!! More Time consuming, etc.

expensive service I like the simplicity of using Turbo Tax. I dislike the cost associated with the service. Despite having a relatively simple return, paid a substantial fee to complete. Of course every year the cost rise. Turbo Tax advertisements lead one to believe that some of the services provided are free or low cost. despite simple/uncomplicated returns, very expensive
You are not what I thought give me my money back!!!! I DO NOT LIKE TURBO TAX!! IT IS A RIP OFF!!!!!!!!

Flawed program caused IRS rejection and late file A program error reference the $3,950.00 limit to claim a dependent caused my Federal to be rejected due to "...social security number has already claimed them selves as dependent." Now my Fed. return is late and my dependent has to file an amended return. Many others on TTax blog report the same issue. Program errors for dependent status
Easy to use I found it relatively easy to use the software and it walks you through it step by step. Fairly simple even when having to add additional data.
